metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5703 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
SQL injection vulnerability in libraries/central_columns.lib.php inphpMyAdmin 4.4.x before 4.4.15.7 and 4.6.x before 4.6.3 allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via a crafted database namethat is mishandled in a central column query.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5703` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.6.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.6.3-1').
